detail_desc: Long, fine-knit cardigan in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Jumpers in fine-knit cotton with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with open sides, adjustable straps and metal buckles. Linings and insoles in fabric made from cotton and recycled polyester. Chunky, patterned soles. Heel 5 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight-cut hems.
Body in lace and mesh with a deep V-neck at the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a lined gusset and string back.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Diagonal zip down the front with a chin guard, a fake flap pocket on the tummy, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Fleece lining.
Blouse woven in a cotton blend with broderie anglaise. Short sleeves with three layers of frills,a frill front and back.and a flared peplum. Concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with short slits at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a faux fur collar, diagonal zip at the front, zipped side pockets, and a tab and press-stud at the sides of the hem. Faux fur lining.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Flip-flops with straps in shimmering metallic imitation leather.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Short, sleeveless top in soft, ribbed jersey with a visible seam down the front and decorative knot detail with a gentle draped effect at the hem.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Ankle boots with round toes and a zip in the side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 5.5 cm.

Long jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Long, slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the back. Mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short top in soft, printed jersey with short sleeves and ties at the hem.
Long cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with visible seams.Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, side pockets, and an asymmetric, raw-edge hem. No fasteners.
Long, 5-pocket denim shorts with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and slim legs.
Fitted, calf-length dress in sturdy jersey with a sheen. Round neck, a concealed zip at the back, an asymmetric seam under the bust and a skirt with a seam and flare to the hem. Lined.
Sleeveless top in pleated jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a laser-cut edge at the hem.

Oversized jacket in washed denim with a pile-lined collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides. Pile lining.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a faux fur pompom on top.
Short dress in woven fabric with a wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a print motif.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Gently tailored, double-breasted pea coat in felted fabric with notch lapels and welt side pockets. Lined.
Oversized jumper in a soft, marled knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a wide, ribbed hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Wide, high-waisted, calf-length trousers in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and straight legs.
Boots with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with frills over the shoulders.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.

Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle and a marble-patterned print on the face. Width of strap 1.5 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch approx. 3.3 cm.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cold shoulder top in an airy weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, lace yoke, flounce at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Shorts in narrow-wale corduroy with a glittery print, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with elastication at the top and overlocked, scalloped edges. Extra low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and legs that flare at the hem.

Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, zip down the front with a chin guard, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in a soft weave with a round neckline, buttons at the back and a gathered yoke front and back. Unlined.
Cotton jersey top with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist.
Longer-style, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels and welt front pockets. Lined.

Set with a hoodie and sweatpants in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hoodie with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs. Sweatpants with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Hat in a soft, chunky knit with a wide turned-up hem.
Leggings in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an elasticated waist and a fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and legs with hard-worn details.
Necklaces in different lengths of thin metal chain with rod-shaped pendants.
Smartphone case in plastic covered in imitation leather with a metal chain and imitation leather lanyard.
Slingback ballet pumps in imitation suede with pointed toes and a scalloped edge. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in jersey made from organic cotton with an open chest pocket.
Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke front and back. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a tie belt at the waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a wide, elasticated drawstring waist, wide ribbed hems and side pockets with a ribbed trim. Soft brushed inside.

Jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets with a concealed zip. Long sleeves with contrasting colour panels and elasticated cuffs, and elastication at the hem. Jersey lining.

Small backpack in pile with appliqués and embroidery on the front. Handle and zip at the top, one large inner compartment, a front pocket and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined. Size approx. 10x22x28 cm.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted rubber soles.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems.
Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with long raglan sleeves and buttons at one side. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap. Flap with a decorative metal ring and magnetic fastener, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5x17x21 cm.
Shirt in soft washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Short, A-line dress in a crisp, patterned organic cotton weave with a gathered seam at the top and hips to create volume. Round, gathered neckline with an opening and covered button at the top, low dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports cap in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a tab and hook and loop fastener at the back. Seamless.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Moisturising lip balm in a plastic owl-shaped container. 3.7 g.

Short dress woven in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell blend with a deep V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and a pleated skirt. Short puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning and a frill trim. V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
